content: I'm trying to map various CDA documents to FHIR and have a L1 document to map. The header stuff obviously goes in Composition, but there isn't a link from Composition to a PDF or Word doc or text file to represent the document content. Has anyone else looked at this? My only thought is to have a fake section with the section.entry being a documentreference.
though I'd map a Level a CDA document directly to a docref - that's really what's going on usually
